text: Aevolo is an American UCI Continental cycling team founded in 2017. ==Team roster== ==Major results== ;2018 : National Time Trial Championships, Luis Villalobos :Stage 1 Colorado Classic, Gage Hecht ==References== ==External links== * Category:UCI Continental Teams (America) Category:Cycling teams established in 2017 Category:Cycling teams based in the United States Category:2017 establishments in the United States
title: Aevolo
